customFilenames.description: Enable prompt for custom string to be added into the filename on paste action into document.

name.title: Folder name
name.description:
The folder name that image files should be pasted into.
The default is an `images` folder in the same folder as the asciidoc file.
For subfolders, enter something like `assets/images` without the leading or trailing foreward slash.

dynamicName.title: Place images in folder that is the same as the filename (without the extension)
dynamicName.description:
Place images in a folder named after the filename.
This will offer a dynamic image folder name, and **override the 'Images Folder' setting.**

append.title: Append `imagesFolder` in generated links.
append.description:
`image::images/foo-bdb66.png[]` # `true` (default)
`image::foo-bdb66.png[]` # `false` (You are using the `:imagesdir:` attribute in your document.)

enable.title: Enable
enable.description:
Enabled clipboard tracking for image URL.
**Use with caution:** any valid paths contains in the clipboard will be converted to links.
Support: png.

imageExtensions.title: Image extensions
imageExtensions.description:
Related to clipboard tracking for file URL.
Specify image file extensions to be converted to links.

description: When pasting an image into an asciidoc document, this package will paste clipboard image data as a file into a folder specified by the user. It will then insert the image url within an asciidoc image reference at the current cursor position.
name: asciidoc-image-helper
